title: Pina Colada Milk Punch
instructions:
Pour the rum, coconut water, Velvet falernum, pineapple juice, lime juice, and demerara syrup into a heatsafe mixing bowl.
Over medium-low heat, heat the milk in a saucepan, stirring continuously until the milk begins to bubble around the edges (taking care not to let it boil).
Add the milk to the mixing bowl, stir until it begins to coagulate, and let the mixture sit for 15 minutes.
Strain through a cheesecloth or coffee filter until the mixture is clarified.
Ladle into cups over ice, and garnish with a cherry, pineapple slice, or both.
